# ConnectablePublisher

**Protocol**

A publisher that provides an explicit means of connecting and canceling publication.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol ConnectablePublisher<Output, Failure> : Publisher
```

## Overview

Use a [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/ConnectablePublisher] when you need to perform additional configuration or setup prior to producing any elements.

This publisher doesn’t produce any elements until you call its [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/ConnectablePublisher/connect()] method.

Use [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Publisher/makeConnectable()] to create a [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/ConnectablePublisher] from any publisher whose failure type is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Never].

## Performing explicit connections

- **connect()**: Connects to the publisher, allowing it to produce elements, and returns an instance with which to cancel publishing.

## Connecting automatically

- **autoconnect()**: Automates the process of connecting or disconnecting from this connectable publisher.

## Connectable Publishers

- **Controlling Publishing with Connectable Publishers**: Coordinate when publishers start sending elements to subscribers.

## Inherits From

- Publisher

## Conforming Types

- Publishers.MakeConnectable
- Publishers.Multicast
